mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.id AS city_id, c.name AS city_name, a.id AS address_id, a.name AS address_name, t.id AS tax_condition_id, t.description AS condition_name FROM provider p LEFT JOIN city c ON c.id = p.city_id LEFT JOIN address a ON a.id = p.address_id LEFT JOIN tax_condition t ON t.id = p.tax_condition_id WHERE p.id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO provider (full_name, city_id, address_id, address_number, tax_condition_id, document_type, document_number, phone, mobile, email, website, notes, code_prefix, price_adjustment_formula, active, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{city.id}, #{address.id}, #{addressNumber}, #{taxCondition.id}, #{documentType}, #{documentNumber}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{website}, #{notes}, #{codePrefix}, #{priceAdjustmentFormula}, #{active}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
